Dialogue.Page: Hey it's me actual-real-canonical Ernesto, the magic talking anglerfish.
You wanted to ask me something?

DialogueOption.Text: Did you crash your ship or?
Are you the one and only canonical Ernesto?

Dialogue.Page: I don't have a ship, but yes I magically materialized myself inside of a volcano instead of at Granite's birthday party
I would say yes but then that would be against the spirit of community something or other.
That said, the only canon Ernesto is the one in the Uncertain Futures mod.
If you're from the future and that mod is actually out, yell at Clay if I'm not really in it!
